General.Name: LiveWire Group Inc.
General.Description: LiveWire Group, Inc. manufactures and sells electric motorcycles in the United States, Austria, and internationally. It operates in two segments, Electric Motorcycles and STACYC. The company designs and sells electric motorcycles and parts, electric motorcycle parts, electric balance bikes for kids, accessories, and apparel. It sells its products to wholesale, independent dealers, and independent distributors, as well as direct to consumers online. LiveWire Group, Inc. was founded in 2010 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. LiveWire Group, Inc. is a subsidiary of Harley-Davidson, Inc.
General.Address: 3700 West Juneau Avenue, Milwaukee, WI, United States, 53208
